Reviews.Title: Nice product if you assemble correctly
Reviews.Author: Level1
Reviews.Content: These are perfect for a quick repair or installation of a camera system.*Indoor location using stranded cat5, cat5e, or cat6*Do not expect these to hold up with solid core cat5 wire, will break at the connection when moved around. Use clear silicone on ends or hot glue when using for outdoor applications.

Reviews.Title: Agree that these are not true Baluns - Be aware. Video noise is eminent!
Reviews.Author: Stampeed2000
Reviews.Content: I agree with a previous poster that the video does not work well if using Cat5 cable. One of my cameras I cannot even get to come on with these "baluns"

Reviews.Title: Garbage, these are not real Baluns
Reviews.Author: Blade "Blade"
Reviews.Content: Check the item description: "Note: This connector does Not have video balun function."  - This is very true!If you connect more than one camera to your DVR, you will get horrible noise issues with these (even with separate power supplies).  These are not real Baluns, they are only cable adapters.  Real Baluns have internals that balance the signal, check these with a multi-meter and there is zero resistance between the terminal and connectors.  The only thing useful in this kit is the power plugs.

Reviews.Title: Worked great.
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Worked great.  No issues.  Ran signal and power in one Cat. 5.  Saved time and money by not having to run coax and and power cables.

ProductInfo.Features:
5 Cameras, CAT5 TO BNC Passive Video and Power Balun Transceiver
Great for short distance connection -Easier for CCTV camera installation, save time and save money
2.1 x 5.5mm CCTV Camera DC Power Plug Connector.
Cat5 to BNC Connector
Note: This connector does Not have video balun function.
ProductInfo.Name: 5 Pairs CAT5 TO BNC Passive Video and Power Balun Transceiver
